Package view

Class EnquiryView

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.view.EnquiryView
public class EnquiryView extends Object
View class for rendering the enquiry menu and managing interactions related to camp enquiries. Provides views for students to view, create, edit, and delete their enquiries. Additionally, it contains views for Camp Committee Members to view, reply to, and generate reports for camp enquiries.
Since:
2023-11-18

  • Method Details

    • studentEnquiryView

      public static void studentEnquiryView(Student student)
      Renders the enquiry menu for students and manages user selections to render various views.
      Parameters:
      student - The Student for whom the enquiry menu is rendered.

    • showAllSubmittedEnquiry

      public static void showAllSubmittedEnquiry(Student student)
      Renders all the enquiries submitted by the student
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose enquiries are being displayed.

    • createEnquiryView

      public static void createEnquiryView(Student student)
      Renders view for student to create a new enquiry for a selected camp.
      Parameters:
      student - The student creating the enquiry.

    • editEnquiryView

      public static void editEnquiryView(Student student)
      Renders view for student to edit one of their submitted enquiries that have not been processed by the camp committee.
      Parameters:
      student - The student editing the enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiryView

      public static void deleteEnquiryView(Student student)
      Renders view for student to delete one of their submitted enquiries that have not been processed by the camp committee.
      Parameters:
      student - The student deleting the enquiry.

    • showAllEnquiryStaffView

      public static void showAllEnquiryStaffView(Staff staff)
      Displays the view for showing all enquiries for camps managed by a specific Staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - The Staff object representing the staff member.

    • viewEnquiryView

      public static void viewEnquiryView(UUID campUID, User user)
      Renders view for camp committee members to reply to enquiries and update enquiry status.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of camp for which the enquiries are being replied to.
      user - The Camp Committee Member who is replying to the enquiries.

    • replyEnquiryView

      public static void replyEnquiryView(UUID campUID, User replier)
      Renders view for camp committee members to reply to a specific enquiry and updates the enquiry status. Additionally, adds points to the Camp Committee Member for replying to the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of camp for which the enquiry is being replied to.
      replier - The Camp Committee Member who is replying to the enquiry.

    • generateEnquiryReportView

      public static void generateEnquiryReportView(UUID campUID)
      Displays menu for users to select filter when generating enquiry report. Users can choose to view all enquiries, pending enquiries (those that have yet to be replied) or enquiries that have already been replied.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of camp for which the enquiry report is to be generated
